metadata.title: CVE-2020-13300 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: GitLab CE/EE version 13.3 prior to 13.3.4 was vulnerable to an OAuthauthorization scope change without user consent in the middle of theauthorization flow.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
